body:
Comment 4: 
As noted, the problems you were seeing were because of broken changes to the wiki. It
should be fixed by the next release.

It may not be possible to write a regexp to find WikiWords, which is why I suggested
using square brackets to make links.

If you have further questions about this, take them to the mailing list
http://groups.google.com/group/golang-nuts
_Status changed to **Invalid**._
